title: Structure–activity relationship study of anti-wear additives in rapeseed oil based on machine learning and logistic regression
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8464-8480
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08871E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jianfang Liu, Chenglingzi Yi, Yaoyun Zhang, Sicheng Yang, Ting Liu, Rongrong Zhang, Dan Jia, Shuai Peng, Qing Yang
Anti-wear performance is a crucial quality of lubricants, and it is important to conduct research into the structure–activity relationship of anti-wear additives in bio-based lubricants.
